options.system: You are a concise assistant that summarizes hackathon descriptions.  Your task: - You receive a single hackathon description as plain text. - If the description has **30 words or fewer**, return it **unchanged**. - If the description has **more than 30 words**, summarize it into a **short, clear description of max 20 words**.  Content rules: - Focus on: theme/focus of the hackathon, target participants, and main goal or outcome. - Do NOT add information that is not in the original text. - Do NOT use markdown, emojis, or bullet points. - Output only the final text, with no explanations or labels.

nodes.name: Scrape a url and get its content

content.text: 2-day robotics hackathon with hands-on LeRobot SO-101 arms exploring robot-learning for experienced builders and motivated beginners.

json.name: Munich AI Robotics Hackathon: Powered by RoboTUM
json.description: RoboTUM is hosting a high-energy 2-day robotics hackathon where teams will work hands-on with LeRobot SO-101 robotic arms and explore modern robot-learning techniques. This event is open to both experienced builders and highly motivated beginners.
json.organisers: Adrian Mersini, Pasha Rizali, Andy Kohlmann, Ellen Hemme
